itemDescription: English-Russian writer, translator and wife of Maxim Litvinov (1889-1977)

wikipedia_page.main: Ivy Teresa Low Litvinov (Russian: Айви Вальтеровна Литвинова) (4 June 1889 – 16 April 1977) was an English-Russian writer and translator, and wife of Soviet diplomat and foreign minister Maxim Litvinov. She was also known as Ivy Low, Ivy Litvinova or Ivy Litvinoff.

response: * Ivy Low Litvinov (1889 – 1977), English-Russian writer and translator
